languages.text: {n}Из вокса доносится сдавленный вздох.{/n} "Н-не гневитесь, Ваша Светлость, но этот слуга ничего не знает. Было велено передать без лишних вопросов и разговоров, или лишусь языка... снова. И... в-вот... едва ли я смогу вам помочь..." {n}Парень испуганно пожимает плечами, несколько раз старательно откланивается и спешит покинуть кабинет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Из вокса доносится сдавленный вздох.{/n} "Н-не гневитесь, Ваша Светлость, но этот слуга ничего не знает. Было велено передать без лишних вопросов и разговоров, или лишусь языка... снова. И... в-вот... едва ли я смогу вам поомочь..." {n}Парень испуганно пожимает плечами, несколько раз стрательно откланивается и спешит покинуть кабинет.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}A strained sigh comes out of the vox.{/n} "P-please stay your anger, Your Lordship, but this servant knows nothing. He was instructed to deliver this without asking or answering any questions on pain of losing his tongue... again. S-so... h-here we are... I'm afraid I can't help you..." {n}The servant shrugs nervously, then offers you several deep bows and swiftly departs.{/n}

И... в-вот... едва ли я смогу вам помочь..." {n}Парень испуганно пожимает плечами, несколько раз старательно откланивается и спешит покинуть кабинет.{/n}

languages.text: {n}音阵中传出一声沉重的叹息。{/n}“请息怒，大人，但我真的什么也不知道。我只是奉命行事，若是我敢开口提问或回答，我就会再次……被拔掉舌头。所以……我……我恐怕帮不上你的忙……”{n}年轻仆人紧张地耸了耸肩，又深深地鞠了几躬，快步离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strained sigh comes out of the vox.{/n} "P-please stay your anger, Your Lordship, but this servant knows nothing. He was instructed to deliver this without asking or answering any questions on pain of losing his tongue... again. S-so... h-here we are... I'm afraid I can't help you..." {n}The servant shrugs nervously, then offers you several deep bows and swiftly departs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵中传出一声沉重的叹息。{/n}“请息怒，大人，但我真的什么也不知道。我只是奉命行事，若是我敢开口提问或回答，我就会再次……被拔掉舌头。所以……我……我恐怕帮不上你的忙……”{n}年轻仆人紧张地耸了耸肩，又深深地鞠了几躬，快步离开了。{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}Ein angestrengtes Stöhnen ertönt aus dem Vox.{/n} "B-Bitte zügelt Euren Zorn, Euer Lordschaft, doch dieser Diener weiß nichts. Er wurde angewiesen, dies zu überbringen, ohne Fragen zu stellen oder zu beantworten, weil er sonst seine Zunge verliert ... erneut. A-Also ... h-hier ist es ... Ich fürchte, ich kann Euch nicht helfen ..." {n}Der Diener zuckt nervös mit den Schultern, verneigt sich mehrmals tief und verlässt schnell den Raum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strained sigh comes out of the vox.{/n} "P-please stay your anger, Your Lordship, but this servant knows nothing. He was instructed to deliver this without asking or answering any questions on pain of losing his tongue... again. S-so... h-here we are... I'm afraid I can't help you..." {n}The servant shrugs nervously, then offers you several deep bows and swiftly departs.{/n}

Er wurde angewiesen, dies zu überbringen, ohne Fragen zu stellen oder zu beantworten, weil er sonst seine Zunge verliert ... erneut. A-Also ... h-hier ist es ... Ich fürchte, ich kann Euch nicht helfen ..." {n}Der Diener zuckt nervös mit den Schultern, verneigt sich mehrmals tief und verlässt schnell den Raum.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}Le vox émet un soupir.{/n} « V-veuillez calmer votre colère, Votre Seigneurie, le serviteur que je suis ne sait rien. Il a reçu pour consigne de remettre ceci sans poser de question ni répondre à aucune question, sous peine de perdre sa langue... une nouvelle fois. V-voilà tout... Je crains de ne pas pouvoir vous aider... » {n}Le serviteur hausse les épaules nerveusement, puis effectue plusieurs courbettes avant de partir précipitamment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strained sigh comes out of the vox.{/n} "P-please stay your anger, Your Lordship, but this servant knows nothing. He was instructed to deliver this without asking or answering any questions on pain of losing his tongue... again. S-so... h-here we are... I'm afraid I can't help you..." {n}The servant shrugs nervously, then offers you several deep bows and swiftly departs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox émet un soupir.{/n} « V-veuillez calmer votre colère, Votre Seigneurie, le serviteur que je suis ne sait rien. Il a reçu pour consigne de remettre ceci sans poser de question ni répondre à aucune question, sous peine de perdre sa langue... une nouvelle fois. V-voilà tout... Je crains de ne pas pouvoir vous aider... » {n}Le serviteur hausse les épaules nerveusement, puis effectue plusieurs courbettes avant de partir précipitamment.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}Un suspiro tenso sale del voco.{/n} «C-contenga su ira, por favor, milord. Este sirviente no sabe nada. Se le ordenó entregar esto sin hacer ni responder preguntas bajo amenaza de perder la lengua... otra vez. A-así que... aquí estamos... Me temo que no puedo ayudarle...». {n}El sirviente se encoje de hombros nerviosamente, hace varias reverencias y se marcha rápidamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strained sigh comes out of the vox.{/n} "P-please stay your anger, Your Lordship, but this servant knows nothing. He was instructed to deliver this without asking or answering any questions on pain of losing his tongue... again. S-so... h-here we are... I'm afraid I can't help you..." {n}The servant shrugs nervously, then offers you several deep bows and swiftly departs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un suspiro tenso sale del voco.{/n} «C-contenga su ira, por favor, milord. Este sirviente no sabe nada. Se le ordenó entregar esto sin hacer ni responder preguntas bajo amenaza de perder la lengua... otra vez. A-así que... aquí estamos... Me temo que no puedo ayudarle...». {n}El sirviente se encoje de hombros nerviosamente, hace varias reverencias y se marcha rápidamente.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}張り詰めたため息がヴォクスから出てくる。{/n}「ど…どうか怒りをお納めください、陛下、この使用人は何も知らないのです。何も尋ねず、何も答えずにこれを届けるように命じられただけです。違反すれば再び舌を失うという処罰を受けます。な…なので…ここにこうしているのです…お力になれず、申し訳ありません…」{n}使用人はおどおどと肩をすくめると、何度か深くお辞儀をして、素早く立ち去る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strained sigh comes out of the vox.{/n} "P-please stay your anger, Your Lordship, but this servant knows nothing. He was instructed to deliver this without asking or answering any questions on pain of losing his tongue... again. S-so... h-here we are... I'm afraid I can't help you..." {n}The servant shrugs nervously, then offers you several deep bows and swiftly departs.{/n}

traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}Vokstan gergin bir iç çekiş duyuyorsun.{/n} "Lütfen sinirlerinize hâkim olun Lord Hazretleri. Bu âciz hizmetkârın bir malumatı yok. Kendisi bunu sorgusuz sualsiz teslim etmekle görevlendirildi. Konuşursa dilini... Yine kaybetmekle tehdit edildi. Ya... Yani... Anlayacağınız... Yardımcı olamayacağım..." {n}Hizmetkâr, endişeyle omuz silkiyor. Ardından birkaç kez daha eğilip hızlıca ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strained sigh comes out of the vox.{/n} "P-please stay your anger, Your Lordship, but this servant knows nothing. He was instructed to deliver this without asking or answering any questions on pain of losing his tongue... again. S-so... h-here we are... I'm afraid I can't help you..." {n}The servant shrugs nervously, then offers you several deep bows and swiftly departs.{/n}
